attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to extend to all electoral wards/divisions the existing* provision allowing electors living in areas with Parish Councils (in England) and Community Councils (in Wales) to hold referenda.

*Part 3, schedule 12, paragraph 18, subparagraphs 4 and 5 of the Local Government Act 1972.
